law.history: Repealed 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 312, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 395, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 432, sec. 5, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-116.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Credit for local licenses on state retail licenses.
